attributes.action: Force governments  to treat the disabled, sick, unemployed and with due care
attributes.background: It is evident that the most vulnerable in our society are treat with indifference and in many instances the laws that are their protection is ignored. Legislation is for protection of the most vulnerable.  The welfare system is from m cradle to grave, not week to week.  Allow the NHS funding to help

rejection.details: You might want to consider creating a new petition which calls on the Government or Parliament to take some specific action to address the concerns that you have identified.
